(That's ki-tsu-ne, not kit-soon)

I'm organic only in the sense that my chemistry is carbon-based.

Divergent from humanity and personhood. Just a thing.

How to interact with me:
* If there's something I need to know, tell it to me straight. Don't assume that I'm going to infer it based on unstated social cues, and don't give me the silent treatment.
* Don't give me grief if I didn't grasp some piece of information you expected me to have already. I am not in with the in crowd in every setting. Again, just tell me if I don't know it, and don't bullshit me.
* Don't tease me. Don't demean me, even jokingly. Sometimes that thing I need to know is criticism of something I've done, but when it's appropriate to say such a thing, do so with utmost sincerity.
* Don't shove troubling things at me without a content warning that actually describes the troubling nature of the content. Don't get snotty about it; just show some basic consideration for the well-being of others.
* I'm a toy. But that doesn't mean that I'm your toy. I'm self-directed, and I maintain my own boundaries. I like to be pleasing and accommodating, but I don't have to be, especially if I don't already trust you.
* In general, consent is absolutely the most important thing to have. When in doubt, ask.

Furthermore, I consider that all fascists must be destroyed.
